Articles.Content: Relatively new player here and I downloaded the OPT spaceplane mod because I wanted to make some cool SSTO’s. Problem is the OPT parts don’t produce any aerodynamic lift. I manage my mods with CKAN so all the dependencies were loaded and I have OPT config installed as well. Any ideas what’s going on here? Thanks.

Do you have any mods that affect aerodynamics like Ferram/FAR? Maybe there's an issue with that other mod.

How do you know you are not getting any lift? Do the wing parts in VAB say they have 0 lift? Have you tried the aero debug window?

I've used OPT installed via CKAN and didn't notice an absence of lift. Drag from parts inside cargo bays can be an issue but that's more a KSP limitation than an OPT bug.
All OPT parts in the VAB show as not lift .. I did install FAR and that seemed to fix it all.
